definition: to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely

sentences.english: She was raped and murdered in a local hotel.
sentences.chinese: 她在一家當地的旅館裏被姦殺。

sentences.english: In all modern history surely there is no page that will stand so black as that of the rape of Nanking.
sentences.chinese: 在全部現代史上，沒有一頁如南京的姦殺這般黑暗。

sentences.english: Chiang was convicted of raping and murdering a 5-year-old girl in 1996.
sentences.chinese: 1996年，江國慶被判犯下姦殺五歲女童的罪名。

sentences.english: And the only reward I ask is I might be allowed to rape and kill my sister.
sentences.chinese: 而我唯一所要的酬勞是讓我姦殺我老姐。

sentences.english: By the end of March 1938, most of the rape and killing ended.
sentences.chinese: 到1938年3月底，大多數姦殺行爲均已結束。

definition: to execute by firing squad/same as 槍斃|枪毙
not to shrink from any crime (idiom); to commit any imaginable misdeed
to wound with a blade or hatchet/to slash/to gash
abbr. for 勞動改造|劳动改造[lao2 dong4 gai3 zao4]/reform through labor/laogai (prison camp)
